subject: Basketball
Basketball (College)
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Kansas freshman Joel Embiid is entering the N.B.A. draft after a season that ended with a stress fracture in his back that kept him out of the N.C.A.A. tournament.
snippet: The Kansas freshman Joel Embiid is entering the N.B.A. draft after a season that ended with a stress fracture in his back that kept him out of the N.C.A.A. tournament.
